name: NightCaster: Defeat the Darkness
description: NightCaster: Defeat the Darkness is a third-person, single-player, action-adventure game for the Xbox, developed by VR1 Entertainment and published by Microsoft. Players take the role of Arran, a novice wizard whose magical power grows as he ages throughout his quest to collect spells and rid the world of eternal night. NightCaster was released on December 26, 2001, and its ESRB rating is Teen.
